feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add more automation tests by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14369
  • Fixes + table native paste by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14342
  • Binding Drawer and CodeEditor fixes by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14370
  • Setup DEFAULT_VALUES feature flag. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14376
  • CouchDB SQS 2.0 image by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14366
  • Cache feature flags per-request, set default values flag to false by default. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14379
  • More automation typing in preparation for branching by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14378
  • Use HBS context over helpers when names overlap (formulas) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14381
  • App import issue (invalid attachments) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14385
  • Feature flag cleanup by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14384
  • Disallow importing backend-core barrel file by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14388
  • Update automation test builder to support branching by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14387
  • Fix for feature flag issue by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14389
  • allow a custom docker registry to be passed if required to helm chart by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14395

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.3...2.30.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • auto generate encryption key, and use secrets by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14405
  • Fix: Handle setting of env vars in .env gracefully by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14347

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.4...2.30.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [BUDI-8460] Add New Step to Table Screen Template by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14203
  • allow values to be passed in secrets by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14407

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.5...2.30.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Split columns setting button/content by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14406
  • Honor table and view schema on query by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14351
  • SQS - broken relationship fix by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14413

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.6...2.30.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix for maximum call stack exceeded by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14416
  • Invalid primary display setting (no relationship columns) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14418

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.7...2.30.8
